original_text: And the eyes of them both were opened, and they knew that they were naked; and they sewed fig leaves together, and made themselves aprons.
korean_text: 이에 그들의 눈이 밝아져 자기들이 벗은 줄을 알고 무화과나무 잎을 엮어 치마로 삼았더라

sentences.original_text: And the eyes of them both were opened
and they knew that they were naked
and they sewed fig leaves together
